name: Thanatos (itch)
description:
*Make sure your sound is turned on. Best played in fullscreen.*

It is the year 2176. Your father and his ship, The Thanatos Voyager, disappeared 25 years ago. No one knows what happened. You have been trying to solve the mystery for your entire life. You have found the only thing left behind by the ship, a computer. Maybe there will be something left on it that will hint to where the ship could be, or what could have happened...

This game was created using Inky.
